main.name: Yergeni Cabranes
main.description: I work at Night Owl Security Products, LLC
main.bio: I am a passionate software developer with strong knowledge in all stages of the development cycle for dynamic projects. Experienced in Object-Oriented Programming. I have more than 6 years working on different projects using several technologies. I am well knowledge in database design, code review, implementing data structures, programming patterns, analysis of algorithms, UI/UX,  and project documentation.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details.

resume.skillmessage: Most important skills in the last 3 years.

projects.title: Night Owl Protect CMS
projects.description: » Currently workig on the phase 1 of a desktop application for macOS and Windows using ReactJS + Electron that will allow clients watching thier device live view, playbacks, download events, as well as change configurations on their NVT (Network Video Transmitters).

projects.title: Night Owl Protect Web Portal
projects.description: » Implemented an initial release of the front-end (UI/UX) for a Web Portal using ReactJS and AWS Cloud Services. It allows users to register new devices, reset their device local password (decreased the number of calls to our support team by 60% for this issue), see their device information, and handle their Night Owl Protect account.

projects.title: Legacy Password Reset Tool
projects.description: » Implemented a Web Interface tool using JavaScript with AWS Cognito, API Gateway, Lambda, and SNS. Allowing users to reset their DVR/NVR password. Decreasing technical support calls and the amount of money spent monthly by the company for this issue.

projects.title: Night Owl Certificate Monitoring Service
projects.description: » Developed a serverless project using Amazon Web Service (AWS) for monitoring the company's certificates (Apple and GoDaddy) sending notifications (email and SMS) periodically to act in time for a certificate close to expiring.

projects.title: Engle Implant Dentistry Intranet
projects.description: » Implemented an internal intranet using Angular 2+ integrated with ASP.NET MVC, WebAPI, Microsoft SQL, and the Microsoft Active Directory as the authentication provider. It allowed the staff to request time correction and time-off, check the phone extensions for the different clinics, among other functionalities.

projects.title: Network & System Administrator
projects.description: » Monitored configured, and maintained the network and services of four dental clinics to increase efficiency, enhance workflow and improve customer satisfaction.

projects.title: Ticket System for CubaTaxi
projects.description: » Participated in the design and implementation of an internal ticket system to allow the CubaTaxy company employees to assign taxi requests to taxi drivers. Performed the deployment and ensured security tests, hardware requirements, availability tests, and daily database backups. Provided technical support and troubleshooting after deployment to identify issues and improve stability. Team size 3 developers.

projects.title: IT Deparment Ticket System for Cubatel.SA
projects.description: » Implemented an internal ticket system using .NET technologies (ASP.NET and SQL Database) to allow the company employees to register IT related issues, decreasing the IT department response by 30%.

projects.title: Cubatel SA Intranet for Cubatel.SA
projects.description: » Implemented two of five modules (Asset Management and Project Management) from a project intended to automate all the processes in the company areas.

technologies.js: ReactJS, Typescript, Hooks, Redux, nodeJS, Electron Forge.

testimonials.text: One of my best hiring decisions as a Tech Team Lead was hiring Yergeni. He is a capable software engineer, (working on a team or as a sole contributor) who focuses on delivering. I was amazed by his performance in fast-paced scenarios under pressure. Yergeni is able to learn new tech stacks in a short period of time and is capable of owning projects from whiteboard to release. I totally recommend Yergeni as he will be a great addition to any software company/team/project in need of good engineers with his skillset.
